structure.unit: Chapter 33B AREAS OF CRITICAL ENVIRONMENTAL CONCERN

text.section:
Sec. 33B-12. Designation of area.
It is hereby declared that the land area described in is an area of significant environmental and natural resource value to Metropolitan Miami-Dade County, Florida, and is inextricably related to the health, safety and welfare of the present and future inhabitants of, and visitors to, Metropolitan Miami-Dade County and, as such constitutes an area of critical environmental concern in Metropolitan Miami-Dade County.
